snippet: The responses by Joseph Biden and Paul D. Ryan revealed an almost perfect archetypal contrast in how contemporary Catholics these days relate to their faith, and why what some call "the Catholic vote" is a constituency as deeply divided as the rest...
abstract: The responses by Joseph Biden and Paul D. Ryan revealed an almost perfect archetypal contrast in how contemporary Catholics these days relate to their faith, and why what some call "the Catholic vote" is a constituency as deeply divided as the rest of the electorate.

headline.main: An Abortion Question Shows Divide Among Catholics
